\begin{lstlisting}[language=c,caption=Problem 1 Input Task, label=list:p1_task1]
void hello_task(void *pvParameters) {
    while (1) {
        PRINTF("Enter a string input\n");
        scanf("%s", usr_str);

        vTaskDelay(1000 / portTICK_PERIOD_MS);
        xTaskNotifyGive(t_handle_2);
        vTaskDelete(NULL);
    }
}
\end{lstlisting}
